faqs.question: What is the check-in and check-out time?
faqs.answer: Check-in is from 3:00 PM, and check-out is until 12:00 PM.

faqs.question: Do you offer free Wi-Fi?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi in all rooms and public areas.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Cancellations must be made 24 hours before the check-in date to avoid a one-night charge.

faqs.question: Do you have parking facilities?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer free parking for all our guests.

faqs.question: Are pets allowed?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are a pet-friendly hotel. Additional charges may apply.

faqs.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
faqs.answer: Check-in is from 2:00 PM and check-out is until 11:00 AM.

faqs.question: Is breakfast included in the room rate?
faqs.answer: Yes, a complimentary breakfast is included in the room rate.

faqs.question: Do you offer airport shuttle service?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a complimentary airport shuttle service for our guests.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my reservation?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your reservation up to 48 hours before your check-in date without any charge.

faqs.question: Do you have a fitness center?
faqs.answer: Yes, our fitness center is open 24/7 and is available for all guests.
